attributes.action: Tell us if you also believe the Prince Charles letter debacle is more a scheme by lawyers to further enrich lawyers.
attributes.additional_details: It should NOT be in the remit of one man who is a lawyer (Dominic Grieve) to make decisions on his own which will only end up costing the taxpayer millions which will end up being paid over to his friends and colleagues in the legal profession.  The people should have the legal right to see EVERYTHING passed to a government minister in the performance of his job.  If Mr Grieve wishes to keep these letters secret then he should be invited to pay the legal costs out of his own pocket - and WITHOUT the opportunity to reclaim them through the MPs Expenses Scam.
